data.eml:eml: Zorotypus novobritannicus n. sp., the first species of the order Zoraptera (Zorotypidae) from the Australasian Ecozone

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Terry, Matthew D., Whiting, Michael F. (2012): Zorotypus novobritannicus n. sp., the first species of the order Zoraptera (Zorotypidae) from the Australasian Ecozone. Zootaxa 3260: 53-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.215428
